title: Initiative: Backlog Maintenance
description: Chores to keep the backlog manageable and agent-friendly.

title: Epic: Split Backlog by Initiative
description: Break backlog.jsonl into smaller files so agents can read them without chunking. Current file is ~28K tokens, exceeding 25K read limit.

title: Design backlog file structure
description: Define how to split: one file per initiative (bd-f001.jsonl, bd-c001.jsonl, etc.) plus an index file (backlog-index.jsonl) with just initiatives and epics for quick overview.
acceptance_criteria: File structure documented. Index file format defined. Naming convention established.

title: Create backlog-index.jsonl
description: Create lightweight index file containing only initiatives and epics (no stories). Enables agents to quickly understand project scope.
acceptance_criteria: Index file under 5K tokens. Contains all initiatives and epics with descriptions. Stories excluded.

title: Split backlog into per-initiative files
description: Create separate files: bd-f001.jsonl (Foundation), bd-c001.jsonl (Core), bd-t001.jsonl (Thrower), etc. Each under 10K tokens.
acceptance_criteria: Each initiative has own file. All files under 10K tokens. No data loss.

title: Update CLAUDE.md for new structure
description: Update agent instructions to read backlog-index.jsonl first, then specific initiative files as needed.
acceptance_criteria: CLAUDE.md updated with new file reading instructions. Agents can efficiently navigate split backlog.

title: Archive original backlog.jsonl
description: Move original monolithic backlog to beads/archive/ for reference. Verify split files are complete.
acceptance_criteria: Original archived. Split files verified to contain all entries. No orphaned items.
